com.team1829.library

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1829.library.Control

  • public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    A Control represents a source of data from a controller. Each Control has a USB port which identifies which controller the control data originates from, and a controller ID which tells which specific button, thumbstick, slider, or other physical input from that controller in question.
    Author:
    Nick Mosher, Team 1829 Carbonauts Captain

      • Control

        public Control(java.lang.String name,
       CarbonUI.ControlType type,
       int port,
       int id)
        Parameters:
        port - The USB port of the controller that this piece of control data is originating from.
        ID - The ID of the physical input on the controller that this piece of data is originating from.
